summary: This will restore Whiterun to it\'s original state before the civil war. Plus some extra.
descriptionHtml:
This will restore Whiterun to it\'s original state before the civil war. This one is different because it also repairs the towers and debris outside the main gate and around the stable. I also added spikes to the two towers at the main outer gate. You can also install it before or after the civil war and all will be the same.

Change log:
v1.4 - Finished fixing smoke issues.
v1.3 - Tried to fix some issues with smoke coming from the ground outside the gate.
v1.2 - Minor tweaks to get it ready for merged version. Also fixed missing light outside outer gate.
v1.1 - Fixed missing house issue. Removed some smoke areas outside of gate.
v1.0 - Initial Release.



[color=yellow]Check Out My Other Mods[/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15567]Stop The Dark Brotherhood Forever Quest From Returning[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15693]Breezehome Extra Light[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18158]Solitude Repaired[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18234]Windhelm Repaired[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18526]Civil War Repairs[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18280]No Warning[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16663]Muffle Your Horse[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17285]Muffle Your Dog[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17309]Muffle The Bards[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17641]Muffle The Nirnroot[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17695]Muffle Heimskr - The Preacher in Whiterun[/url]

[size=5][color=red]- Have Fun -[/color][/size]
author: MightyMalts
